properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LOAN WHERE USER_ID = ?

SELECT LID, BK_NAME, WRITER, PUBLISHER, LOAN_DATE, RETURN_DATE, STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, A.* FROM ( SELECT L.LID, K.BK_NAME, K.WRITER, K.PUBLISHER, A.LOAN_DATE, A.RETURN_DATE, A.STATUS FROM LDETAIL L, LOAN A, BOOK K, BDETAIL B WHERE L.LID = A.LID AND L.CALL_NUM = B.CALL_NUM AND B.ISBN = K.ISBN AND A.USER_ID = ?) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY LID DESC

SELECT LID, BK_NAME, WRITER, PUBLISHER, LOAN_DATE, RETURN_DATE, STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, A.* FROM ( SELECT L.LID, K.BK_NAME, K.WRITER, K.PUBLISHER, A.LOAN_DATE, A.RETURN_DATE, A.STATUS FROM LDETAIL L, LOAN A, BOOK K, BDETAIL B WHERE L.LID = A.LID AND L.CALL_NUM = B.CALL_NUM AND B.ISBN = K.ISBN AND A.USER_ID = ?) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY RETURN_DATE ASC

A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY LOAN_DATE ASC

A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY LOAN_DATE DESC

SELECT LID, BK_NAME, WRITER, PUBLISHER, LOAN_DATE, RETURN_DATE, STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, A.* FROM ( SELECT L.LID, K.BK_NAME, K.WRITER, K.PUBLISHER, A.LOAN_DATE, A.RETURN_DATE, A.STATUS FROM LDETAIL L, LOAN A, BOOK K, BDETAIL B WHERE L.LID = A.LID AND L.CALL_NUM = B.CALL_NUM AND B.ISBN = K.ISBN AND A.USER_ID = ?) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY STATUS DESC
UPDATE LOAN SET STATUS = '반납신청' WHERE LID = ?
